What kind of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: Hello, I have a problem. For reasons unknown to me, I cannot access my templates and the editing area. When I call up a template, I see an empty frame and I don't see anything on the side of the graphic modules or the editing area. Why can't I edit templates? I've booked the pro version until next year. I ask for timely information about my account and the problem I have reported. Thanks in advance. Kind regards, Katrin Dathe
